Last month, Michael Vick signed his first paid endorsement contract since his release from prison, a two-year deal with Unequal Technologies, a provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of this season. To sum it all up, the last five months, have been delayed gratification, Michael Vick said. ago, has called on the Legislature to enact by March 1 an austere spending plan that includes deep reductions in welfare, health care for the poor and the state's universities, among other programs. If not, he said, "We will run out of money to pay the bills."

Bloomberg News reported Thursday that the bonuses would average$ 10,000 for 10,755 salaried workers, but some who aren't covered by government pay restrictions could get up to half their salary.
